name: Towards the Stage Beyond the Rerun, Nana Daiba
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each other 《Revue》 character in your center stage. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Annihilation Revue" is in your climax area, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Choose 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." "If you have 4 or more other 《Revue》 characters, choose 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn."

name: Path Adorned with Cherry Blossoms, Kaoruko Hanayagi
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 Memory If "My Own Shine, Futaba Isurugi" is in your memory, this card gets +4000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card direct attacks, you may choose 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Stage Girl of the Silver Screen, Nana Daiba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, this card gets +2 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Stage Girl of the Silver Screen, Kaoruko Hanayagi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 《Revue》 character among those cards, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Our Future Destination, Kaoruko Hanayagi
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play events or "Backup" from your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

name: Hunting Revue, Nana Daiba
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your "Green Glow, Junna Hoshimi", that character gets +1500 power until end of turn, and if there are no markers underneath that character, choose up to 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath that character as a marker.

name: Our Future Destination, Nana Daiba
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Revue》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and the following abilities. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.

name: Selfish Highway, Kaoruko Hanayagi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When "Waiting for You" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent, and deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Disregarding the Words, Nana Daiba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all characters in your opponent's center stage get -500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Revue》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Revue》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: They do not affect me, move me, nor reach me.

name: The One Mesmerized by the Stage Girls, Giraffe
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in the original order. 【AUTO】 When your opponent's climax is placed on their climax area, you may put this card into your stock.
flavorText: Hikari: "Where's Karen?"

name: Dancing Sword, Nana Daiba
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Revue》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

name: Breaking Off Ties, Kaoruko Hanayagi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand.
flavorText: I'm breaking off my ties with you.

name: Resentment Revue, Kaoruko Hanayagi
text: 【CONT】 【CXCOMBO】 If "Blooming Rage" is in your climax area, this card in all of your zones gets in the trigger icon. 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《Revue》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Blooming Rage" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Revue》 characters, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Big fat liar.

name: It's All for Me? Kaoruko Hanayagi
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your memory has 2 or less cards, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Choose 1 "My Own Shine, Futaba Isurugi" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory." "Search your deck for up to 1 "My Own Shine, Futaba Isurugi", put it into your memory, and shuffle your deck." 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: It's all for me? Whatever.

name: Now Is the Time to Descend From the Tower, Nana Daiba
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Revue》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Period I Want to Protect, Nana Daiba", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 《Revue》 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your hand, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.
flavorText: Snack time is over.

name: On Top of a Speeding Train, Nana Daiba
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if you have 1 or less other 《Revue》 characters, put this card into your clock.
flavorText: Maya: "If the stage and audience wish it...I am already on stage."

name: Her Real Self, Kaoruko Hanayagi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】.
flavorText: Claudine: "I just figured she'd get in. And I told her that."

name: Flower of the Gambling Den, Kaoruko Hanayagi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Flowers of the Gambling Den, Kaoruko Hanayagi"in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: The spring camellia gave me tomorrow's hope. The summer iris I made a promise to. The autumn leaves bid me farewell. The winter narcissus I slash down.

name: Reminiscence, Nana Daiba
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 2 or more other 《Revue》 characters, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, and you have a 《Revue》 character, at the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room."
flavorText: You were so bright, Junna Hoshimi.

name: To You Who Was Beautiful
text: Choose up to 4 of your opponent's characters, and put them into their memory. You shuffle those characters face down, and put them face down in separate open positions of your opponent's stage. Put those characters face up.
flavorText: Nana: "Those words. They won't get you to that stage."

name: Annihilation Revue
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: The train will arrive at the next station.

name: Waiting for You
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Kaoruko: "Kids will be selfish."

name: Blooming Rage
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)
flavorText: Kaoruko: "Let's take it outside."

name: To Live Her Life on Stage, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 3 or less cards, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Green Glow, Junna Hoshimi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Revue》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put all markers underneath this card into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, if "A Stage Where I'm the Protagonist" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, perform the following action X times. "Deal 1 damage to your opponent." X is equal to the number of markers put into the waiting room by this ability's cost. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Hunting Revue, Junna Hoshimi
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 2 or higher card among those cards, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Should you try to hinder me, I shall capture you. In this Hunting Revue.

name: Stage Girl of the Silver Screen, Junna Hoshimi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Our Future Destination, Junna Hoshimi
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "My Very Own Star, Junna Hoshimi", this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.

name: Our Future Destination, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Revue》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When you use "Accelerate", if your clock has 4 or more cards, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.

name: Stage Girl of the Silver Screen, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Revue》 characters, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: If You Won't Act on Stage, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Revue》 character, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Our Stage" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock, look at the top card of your opponent's deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of their deck.
flavorText: I hated you, Hikari Kagura.

name: You're on the Stage With Me, Right? Mahiru Tsuyuzaki
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When your other "Person By Your Side, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki" is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《Revue》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your opponent's climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1 level, +1500 power, and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card."

name: Honest Feelings, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Revue》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Revue》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText:
Hikari: "You were scared, too, Mahiru?"
Mahiru: "I still am."

name: Unyielding Tenacity, Junna Hoshimi
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if all of your characters are 《Revue》, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Nana: "That's not the role for my Junna!"

name: Her Own Words, Junna Hoshimi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +10000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: 99th Student Council President, Junna Hoshimi.

name: Still an Unfinished Script, Junna Hoshimi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card or your other 《Revue》 character is placed on the stage from your hand, you may look at the top card of your deck. (Return the card you saw to its original place) 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: But the ending…

name: Someday on a New Stage, Junna Hoshimi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's character, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I made you cry.

name: Cheering On, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Revue》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Specially Made Gold Medal", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Hikari! I'm glad I was able to stand on stage with you!

name: Aiming for the Gold Medal, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Co-star Revue" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Revue》 character, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is "Specially Made Gold Medal" or a 《Revue》 character, put it into your hand, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《Revue》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, if you have another 《Revue》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, put it in any position of your stage, and this card gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Compete with technique and power. Acknowledge each other and aim for higher heights. That's what rivals do. - Rivals!

name: For the Field Trip, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, you may choose 1 level 3 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText:
Claudine: "What's this?"
Mahiru: "Questions to ask tomorrow at the New National Opera Company."
Claudine: "Isn't it too much?"

name: Overwhelming Impact, Junna Hoshimi
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] You may choose a face up card in your opponent's memory, and put it face down. If you do, at the end of your turn, put that card face up.
flavorText: Nana: "I told you. It's not an audition."

name: More...More...More…
text: Choose 1 of your 【STAND】 《Revue》 characters, and 【REST】 it. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's character, move it to another open position of their stage, choose 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText:
You can act better than that.
Put more feeling into your words.
Say your real lines,
say it like you mean it.
Put more feeling into your words.
Say your real lines.
Say it like you mean it. Show me.

name: Specially Made Gold Medal
text: If you have 2 or less 《Revue》 characters, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose up to 1 "Run! Hikari Kagura" in your hand, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Mahiru: "But you have to go now. Your stage with Karen isn't over yet, is it?"

name: A Stage Where I'm the Protagonist
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: I'm the shining protagonist, Junna Hoshimi!

name: Our Stage
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Mahiru: "Why won't you act? You're on stage."

name: Co-star Revue
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Mahiru: "A stronger brilliance than anyone else."

name: Path Adorned with Cherry Blossoms, Futaba Isurugi
text: 【CONT】 If your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: You and I Together, Claudine Saijo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 1 card, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《Revue》 character, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Next Stage and Next Role, Karen Aijo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Reunion, Hikari Kagura", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "I Am Reborn" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 3 cards from among them, put them into your opponent's waiting room, put the rest into their deck, your opponent shuffles their deck, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn." "Deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Stage Girl of the Silver Screen, Claudine Saijo
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: 【RIVAL】 Claudine Saijo
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "A Beautiful Conclusion" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《Revue》 character, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. " Choose 1 "The Devil's Sweet Talk, Claudine Saijo" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." "Search your deck for up to 1 "The Devil's Sweet Talk, Claudine Saijo", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck." 【AUTO】 When this card frontal attacks, if you have another 《Revue》 character, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to this card's soul ×1000.
flavorText: With my brilliance, I will...

name: Selfish Highway, Futaba Isurugi
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another 《Revue》 character, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 "Making You Wait" from your climax area into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Revue》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Revue》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Stage Girl of the Silver Screen, Karen Aijo
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Revue》 character is placed on the stage from your hand, that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, and put it on the top of their deck in any order.

name: Reunion, Karen Aijo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "I Am Reborn" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is "Train of the Reborn" or a 《Revue》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: Because of my promise with you. That's what got me this far. It's because of my promise with you that I'm able to stand here.

name: Stage Girl of the Silver Screen, Futaba Isurugi
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Revue》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Revue》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Our Future Destination, Futaba Isurugi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] If you have another "My Own Shine, Kaoruko Hanayagi", choose up to 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Our Future Destination, Claudine Saijo
text: 【CONT】 If "Stage Girl of the Silver Screen, Claudine Saijo" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Revue》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may -2 soul from this card until end of turn. If you do, this card gets +1500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Our Future Destination, Karen Aijo
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent has a level 3 or higher character, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +4500 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hands."

name: The Last Line, Karen Aijo
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your main phase, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your 《Revue》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your "The Stage of Fate, Karen Aijo", and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room."

name: Gambling Den, Claudine Saijo
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Kaoruko: "It's your fault. That we..."

name: Greetings, Karen Aijo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Revue》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Um, good morning.

name: Futaba Isurugi Taken Aback
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's waiting room has 3 or more climax, 【REST】 this card. 【AUTO】 [Put 1《Revue》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.
flavorText: Huh?

name: The Devil's Sweet Talk, Claudine Saijo
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Revue》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose the bottom card of your clock and 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, and exchange them. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "【RIVAL】 Claudine Saijo" in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in. (This ability does not activate if this card is not in the stage at the beginning of the climax phase)
flavorText: A playwright and philosopher. I heard you've stood on every stage in the world. So I thought I'd show you. The greatest brilliance nobody has ever seen before.

name: Interrupting, Futaba Isurugi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Revue》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: The butterfly's selfishness and flower's nonsense must have troubled many.

name: After "Starlight" Is Over, Karen Aijo
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Revue》 characters , and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability. "【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot be returned to hand, move to another stage position, or be put into memory."
flavorText: Once Starlight is over.

name: Everyone's Future Path, Claudine Saijo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: No thanks.

name: Skills on the Board, Claudine Saijo
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 "Noble Will, Claudine Saijo" or "Brave Readiness, Maya Tendo" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Revue》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Gosh, you're weak.

name: Why? Futaba Isurugi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put X cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Revue》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 [Return 2 《Revue》 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Revue》 characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: It's not fair!

name: Seeking Understanding, Futaba Isurugi
text: 【AUTO】 Resonate [Reveal 1 ""Our Flower Path" Kaoruko Hanayagi" in your hand] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I have to change. For me. And for you.

name: Unable to Find a Reason, Karen Aijo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: What does the stage mean for me?

name: Lines That Betray Your Thoughts, Karen Aijo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players perform the following action. "If your memory has 5 or more cards, choose 4 cards in your memory, and put all cards in your memory except those cards into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Revue》 characters, you may choose 1 《Revue》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: "I jumped aboard to follow you. What am I to aim for now?"

name: Day Before the Field Trip, Futaba Isurugi
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Revue》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: What do you mean you're not going?

name: Realistic Sword Strike, Claudine Saijo
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Realistic Sword Strike, Maya Tendo", this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Revue》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Realistic Sword Strike, Maya Tendo" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.

name: Train of the Reborn
text: 【CXCOMBO】 Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "Deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled) "Choose 1 "I Am Reborn" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."

name: I Am Reborn
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Making You Wait
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: My turn to make you wait. I know that already.

name: A Beautiful Conclusion
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: Our Future Destination, Hikari Kagura
text: 【CONT】 Assist During your turn, all of your level 1 or higher characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: See You, Hikari Kagura
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Revue》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Final Act, And..." is in your climax area, and you have another 《Revue》 character, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Revue》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: You and I Together, Maya Tendo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Because It's You, My All Can Be..." is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +4500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card's trigger check reveals a card with in its trigger icon, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent 2 times." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Stage Girl of the Silver Screen, Hikari Kagura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Let's Meet Again on This Stage" is in your climax area, and your stock has 6 or less cards, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Revue》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Our Future Destination, Maya Tendo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Revue》 characters, and that character gets +1 soul for each in the trigger icon of the card put into your waiting room until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Stage Girl of the Silver Screen, Maya Tendo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Revue》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 2, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Vessel of the Gods That Reflects Infinity, Maya Tendo
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Revue》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock.
flavorText: The vessel of the gods reflects infinite variations of me.

name: Reunion, Hikari Kagura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《Revue》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put 1 "Reunion, Karen Aijo" from your stage into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "I Am Reborn" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Revue》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Next Stage and Next Role, Karen Aijo" in your waiting room, and put it in the position that the character put into the waiting room by this ability's cost was in.
flavorText: This is the stage, Karen Aijo!

name: Natural Disposition on the Board, Maya Tendo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may 【REST】 this card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: No, I just felt too bad for your little chicks.

name: Time of Farewell, Hikari Kagura
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a ""When the Flower Blooms" Hikari Kagura", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -2 soul until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText:
99th graduating class, Hikari Kagura.
Destiny will change.

name: 【RIVAL】 Maya Tendo
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", if you have 4 or more 《Revue》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Only you could've unveiled me.

name: Aiming for the Gold Medal, Hikari Kagura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Revue》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Co-star Revue" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, search your deck for up to 1 "If You Won't Act on Stage, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: Mahiru!

name: Gazing at the Faraway Sea, Hikari Kagura
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Revue》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: "I'm sorry, my friend. I must set out on my voyage."

name: Beautiful Stage Person, Maya Tendo
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Revue》 character attacks, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Stage Person? And who are you, nameless devil?

name: Greetings, Hikari Kagura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 event from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. If you put 1 card into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Revue》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: How do you do?

name: Seeking a New Stage, Maya Tendo
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [(3) 【REST】 this card] Choose up to 1 "Brave Readiness, Maya Tendo" in your hand, and put it in any position of your stage.

name: Realistic Sword Strike, Maya Tendo
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another "Realistic Sword Strike, Claudine Saijo", this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Revue》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Realistic Sword Strike, Claudine Saijo" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.

name: Run! Hikari Kagura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if "Specially Made Gold Medal" is in your waiting room, this card gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【AUTO】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, at the beginning of the encore step, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《Revue》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, if your hand has 6 or less cards, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.

name: Soul Revue
text: Choose 2 of your 【STAND】 characters, and 【REST】 them. If you 【REST】 2 characters, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card with in its trigger icon from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText:
【A】A hideous sight, surging with emotions.
【B】Show me more, Maya Tendo. That's what the audience wants to see.

name: Ripe Tomato
text: Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room." Put this card into your stock.

name: Final Act, And...
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: "There is but one star on stage. I am Hikari Kagura. The star."

name: Because It's You, My All Can Be...
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Claudine & Maya: "Give me you."

name: Let's Meet Again on This Stage
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText:
Hikari: "I was scared. That I might just become another fan. I couldn't forgive myself for being
starstruck by you, so I ran."

name: Pop-up Stage Girl, Karen Aijo
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: Pop-up Stage Girl, Hikari Kagura
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Pop-up Stage Girl, Mahiru Tsuyuzaki
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Revue》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Pop-up Stage Girl, Claudine Saijo
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Pop-up Stage Girl, Maya Tendo
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Pop-up Stage Girl, Junna Hoshimi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.

name: Pop-up Stage Girl, Nana Daiba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

name: Pop-up Stage Girl, Kaoruko Hanayagi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +4000 power.

name: Pop-up Stage Girl, Futaba Isurugi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Revue》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Ticket to the Stage of Destiny, Karen Aijo
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Revue》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Ticket to the Stage of Destiny, Hikari Kagura
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When your opponent's climax is placed on their climax area, you may put this card into your stock.
